episodes.original_body:
Case: Cory-Stephenson-MVA-9-3-2025
Client: Cory Stephenson

Aaron Whaley contacted Cory Stephenson to assess the current status of his motor vehicle accident case and gather necessary details.
Recap
Aaron Whaley called Cory Stephenson to inquire about his motor vehicle accident case and determine the current status.
Cory provided Aaron with an update on his situation and expressed willingness to proceed with legal representation.
Tasks
Aaron needs to gather more detailed information about Cory's accident and begin the formal case intake process.
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact occurred on September 3, 2025, with Cory Stephenson regarding a motor vehicle accident case. Attorney Aaron Whaley contacted Cory Stephenson to assess the current status of the case and to gather the necessary details.

Per the recap, Whaley called Stephenson to inquire about the motor vehicle accident case and determine its current status. Stephenson provided an update on his situation and expressed willingness to proceed with legal representation. The next step is for Aaron to gather more detailed information about the accident and commence the formal case intake process.
episodes.author: Aaron

about.relevance: initial client contact / subject of case
attorney who contacted client to assess case and commence intake

episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on October 15, 2025 with Cory Stephenson regarding the Cory-Stephenson-MVA-9-3-2025 case. The contact was made by Justin on October 15, 2025.
